import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Product from './Product'; import "./Home.css"; import p from '../img/1.jpg'; import db from '../firebase'; function Home() { const [productss, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { db.collection('productss').onSnapshot(snapshot => { console.log(snapshot.docs.map(doc => ({ id: doc.id, Retailer: doc.data().retailerName }))); setProducts(snapshot.docs.map(doc => ({ id: doc.id, Retailer: doc.data().retailerName }))) }) }, []); return (
) } export default Home
